website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for oily skin, which works where more expensive brands have failed.
pros: Applies easily and smoothly, and only needs a small amount of product for even further savings
Sets well and stops shadow from creasing or bleeding
cons: Does not work as well for mature skin, shows up flaws

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: ladies!! if you have trouble with your shadow staying on, BUY THIS... ive used it all.. ive tried very expensive shadows, to urban decay primer, ect. this WORKS! I put a bit on my lids before my eyeliner & shadow & it stays all day, even the next morning my makeup is still on! I have super oily skin & lids, this is the best, no creases!!!
customer_reviews.author: shael dehors

customer_reviews.title: I spent good money on other options (Urban D
customer_reviews.text: I have oily eyelids that have been challenging to prime for eyeshadows and eyeliners without have them crease 1-2 hours later. I spent good money on other options (Urban D., Too F.) that always left me creased and annoyed. I was skeptical of Wet & Wild at first yet the positive reviews made me try it, and I'm really glad I did. This worked better than all the others I tried before. It's been more than 2 hours since I applied, before I applied my eyeliner and eyeshadow, and I still do not see any mark anywhere on my eyelids. That has never happened before. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: "skydiving99"

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but this product seriously earned its 5 stars from me. I have oily eyelids and even Urban Decay primer potion creases after a few hours. I wore this to an outdoor graduation in Georgia heat, humidity, and rain, and my eyeshadow didn’t budge. When I got home after 12 hours of wear, my eyeshadow was exactly how I applied it. This stuff works miracles, and I will never use another primer.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: not for oily eyelids
customer_reviews.text: I have big eyes and very oily eyelids. I purchased this product based on all the reviews but..it is definitely NOT for me. Just after 1 hour from applying this product, I could clearly see the product accumulating in the eyelid, forming stripes. Then after couple of hours, this product made my eyelid sooo dry that I had to remove it: it did not felt good and was not nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not so great!
customer_reviews.text: I would apply this around 7:00 a.m. as part of my daily routine. By noon my eyeshadow would virtually be gone. I won't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Duffyjr

customer_reviews.title: Affordable must-have primer
customer_reviews.text: This has been compared to the Urban Decay eye primer and honestly this works perfectly as well even though it’s so much cheaper. It’s tinted and dries a bit fast, but as long as you do your eye makeup right away, it stays for pretty long and shows the eyeshadows’ true colors. You just need a little dab each time so the whole tube will last a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Colin L. Zollars

customer_reviews.title: Works, which makes it my new necessity!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, dude! I have always had problems with my eye makeup bleeding. Not once I started using this. I'm no expert at makeup, and I haven't tried any other eye lid primers, but I don't need to right now. This one is very affordable, and it does the job just great!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but does not dry clear.
customer_reviews.text: I have very moist eyelids and this is the only primer I’ve ever used that actually works. I use it to prime for eyeliner. A tiny bit goes a LONG way!! It does not dry clear, though, like the product description says it does, so after I apply my eyeliner over it, I have to use a makeup remover pen to remove the excess primer (even a little bit of excess). Otherwise, it looks like I have brownish crust below my eyeliner. I use this product in conjunction with Model in a Bottle Makeup Setting Spray for Sensitive Skin, which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Andi S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many eyeshadow primers - some ridiculously expensive and this little gem is just as good as the expensive ones (like "you'll thank me later " or Stilla) if not better. Goes on a little tacky but dries fast and smooth. I've never had a problem blending my shadows or placing glitter ones on it. I've worn shadows for 12+ hours with this stuff ! Its hard to find in my local stores sometimes and now I know why ! This is my second tube and they last a while since a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Great dupe for more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: I wish more people knew about this product because it could save them a LOT of money if they are buying high end, similar products. Only have to use a little, its like a cream, but blends easily and leaves no color. But let me tell you, it holds on to my eyeshadow and liner ALL DAY; no creasing, no smudging, no flaking. Lasts till I take it off at the end of the day. HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schroen

customer_reviews.title: Works great for keeping my pencil eyeliner in place!
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Urban Decay but I wanted something less expensive that would still get the job done. I use this mainly to keep my pencil liner in place and it works great. It goes on wet but dries quick enough. I'd say I have an olive skin color it does dry with a little light color to it but it's no biggie. Just make sure you blend it in good and dont use too much. I like it, will purchase more when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Cblk

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried primer for my eye makeup, and I am impressed! Without primer, my eyeliner-no matter the brand-would transfer to my upper eyelid without fail. Using this, all eyeliner stays in place and lasts until removed.
customer_reviews.author: EvelynTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to as far as I can tell, though I have nothing to compare it to, and I don't need my eyeshadow to last 8+ hours. For the price, it held the color well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parks

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! I have yet to find something to help ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have yet to find something to help with the eyelid rainbows I always get, but this is finally the one thing I've found that works. It does still leave a little residue on my eye after all day use, but it's the color of the product (pale cream or flesh colored) instead of my eye shadow leaving the marks. AND bonus, it's not greasy. My eye lids are dry all day (another issue I have).
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: ASHY RESIDUE
customer_reviews.text: After I applied this primer my eyelids were white ashy patchy looking, so this product is now trash. I'm glad I didn't spend much don't waste your money better of using a concealer.
customer_reviews.author: KD3714

customer_reviews.title: Works like more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since I first saw it on the shelf. It works very well to keep eyeshadow going all day without oiliness or creasing - and - it is reasonably priced and far cheaper than high end company costs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leatham

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this primer!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this primer. I have very oily skin and this works all day and night. The cream also feels nice. And I love that it is cruelty free. I paid over 20 for the last one I tried from sophora and it did not work as well (my eye shadow would start to crease after ten or so hours) and did not feel as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in place of my typical primer because I didn’t like the wand aspect (not being able to use every last drop). This has worked just as good as my other brand. Glad I bought. Easy to spread.
customer_reviews.author: Stormyy

customer_reviews.title: Zero creasing after a 12 hour day
customer_reviews.text: My eyelids get oily by noon, and this stuff kept my eyeshadow perfectly in place and just as vibrant as it went on that morning until late in the evening! The color never budged, absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A Small Cat

customer_reviews.title: Mosh proof makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I have oily eyelids and this primer is like sorcery. My makeup does not crease at all. For reference I put my makeup on at around 3pm went to a death metal concert, moshed and sweated all night and my shadow and eyeliner were still on when I got home at 12am.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeshadow primer!
customer_reviews.text: I have the most oily eyelids, and even those so called “bulletproof” eyeliners and eyeshadows crease within an hour. This primer keeps everything from creasing and melting all day, as in 6:30 am to 10:30 pm. It works well under my eyes for concealer too. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: bunnygirl

customer_reviews.title: Gotta get like ten more
customer_reviews.text: I work at Cracker Barrel as a togo server. I move and sweat a lot. Especially today, the first day I tried this. I don’t think you understand. My makeup didn’t move after 10 hours of putting it through a lot. I like to be pretty with my dark eyeshadow and black liquid eyeliner. No creasing. Thanks for coming to my Ted talk
customer_reviews.author: Pheobe Shemwell

customer_reviews.title: Just no
customer_reviews.text: Unless I got a dud, I'm confused by the positive reviews. I've never used eye primer before but my eyeshadow always creases and I figured this would be a good starter. The only thing it did was leave a weird, cakey mess on my eyelids that was super noticeable and that I eventually had to wipe off with makeup remover as I was unable to cover it up. This might work for other people, but for me it was a waste of $5.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Eye makeup stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow primer is so effective at keeping my eye makeup (shadow and liner) in place that it's actually harder to take off my eye makeup after twelve hours of wear. No creases, no rubbing off. It's awesome and it's a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MM717

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong product. Doesn’t seem like I was the first one this happened to either
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Excessive Water?
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is worrying. The primer is orange in color, which is fine; when I squeeze the bottle however, there's an excessive amount of water that leaks out with the product. I am not sure if this is normal, but I did not want to risk putting it near my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Like this product but it gets very cakey and is hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeshadow primer. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good eyeshadow primer. Good product, blends easily. Acceptable price. Very small tube but it seems to work well and keep my shadow in place.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W

customer_reviews.title: Item wasn't even in box!
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset that this item isn't eligible for return because the item wasn't even in the package! Basically I paid $5 for an empty box. Please resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite eyeshadow primer!
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite primer!! I have extremely oily skin therefore my eyelids are a greasy mess. My eyeshadow creases,moves and slips if I don’t wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my oily hooded eyelids
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd try this before coughing up a bunch of cash for Urban Decay's primer. My lids are super hooded and oily, so I've never really worn eyeshadow. Even eyeliner would stick to the upper part of my lid in a matter of minutes. But not anymore! So glad I bought the cheap stuff. Definitely give it a shot before going the pricey route.
customer_reviews.author: Vannie

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does help my eye shadow stay on longer, however I do not think that it dries clear, to me it dries a slightly off white/nude color
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad this was cheap cause I'm throwing it out.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like anything about this product. It is dry coming out of the tube and makes your eyelid very dry so shadow looks cakey. I use Morphe so this is generally not an issue. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled
customer_reviews.text: The title said 1.6 ounces. I ordered it and it was .34 ounces. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amber the gal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing find for so cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best cheap primer I have ever used. It is easy to put on and requires very little to use and performs as well as Urban Decay’s more expense primers. I can use it at 8 am and my eye makeup will remain intact until 8pm that night at least. It performs well in humid environments but can be a little drying in drier climates.
customer_reviews.author: Raven L

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the expensive stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd brand I've tried of this kind of product. It's cheaper than the other 2 and works just as well, if not better! Don't waste your money on Mary Kay brand. Just get this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Great Vegan Primer
customer_reviews.text: I had tried the orange Smashbox primer before and loved it, but I wanted to find a cheaper option. This primer offers longevity and performs how I wanted, so no complaints. Will repurchase in the future
customer_reviews.author: Dandi Alexander

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I've used a shadow primer & I absolutely will NEVER apply shadow without it again. The pigments absolutely popped and I didn't have any issues with them darkening or lid creasing. Will be purchasing again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Although this product works well, not a lot of product. Not sure if I'll purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Fran A. from Denver

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, good value
customer_reviews.text: This is just as good as five other more expensive ones I tried. Fraction of the cost. I also like the simple tube, seems to create less trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ines

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous primers. From Sephora and ulta. This wet and wild one is hands down the best one I have ever used. Locks in my eyeshadow from early morning til I wash it off at night with zero creases.
customer_reviews.author: K Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best eye shadow primer! And cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I typically use urban decay eye potion primer, and it's really expensive. Switched to this, and it works just as well! My eye lids get very oily and liquid eyeliner will always bleed over time... with this stuff, I can wear it all day without worries!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: it's fantastic! It's been a very hot and humid summer
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's fantastic! It's been a very hot and humid summer, and I have oily eyelids. Despite this, this primer has kept both my eyeshadow and gel eyeliner in place all day without smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wichmann

customer_reviews.title: It really helps my eyeliner stay on
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. I'm pleased that my eyeliner & eyeshadow will actually last 2 days with this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.....not the best, but certainly not the worst!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to try it and I wasn't really that impressed. It does what it says it does but it is a little thick for my taste!
customer_reviews.author: Uma Devidasi

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect primer. It’s inexpensive and holds my eyeshadow on for all-day use!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeshadow primer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, works better than the more prices primers I have used.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this stuff. Truly keeps my shadow and liner on all day and won't crease. Can not find this in the stores anymore. It may be a drugstore makeup but its better than the high end brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive this product when I ordered it. I received a paid of revlon tweezers. To top it off, cannot return the product. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bechtel

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This primer works like a charm. I use extremely small amount (1 mm bead) for each eye and smooth over. Keep the shadow in place and even keeps the brow pencil line from bleeding over. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: HinKY

customer_reviews.title: I use this eyeshadow primer the most.
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s made in China, one of the best eyeshadow primers I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I have trouble with my eyelids getting oily and my eyeshadow creasing. This stuff keeps that from happening. My eyeshadow still looks great 6+ hours later! I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Oily Eyelids!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for extremely oily lids!!! Your eyeliner won’t budge in the humidity! You can’t beat the price! Search no further!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but leaves white residue when it dries
customer_reviews.text: It works well but when it dries it leaves a white residue which I don’t like
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Arguijo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this as eyebrow-shadow primer (eyebrow loss due to alopecia) and it's worked as well for me as a much more expensive brand I used to use. It's matte and dries fast. It doesn't take much and stays on all day. I recommend this for eyeshadow, and definitely for eyebrows!
customer_reviews.author: Chama

customer_reviews.title: Nice... no creasing.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and haven't had that old problem of powder creasing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: For being a cheaper product, this eyeshadow primer is on point. Applies smooth and light. Holds my eyeshadow color all day with no creasing or bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Tandi L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Really good primer
customer_reviews.text: This primer is excellent for the price. Comparable to higher end brands. My eyeshadow lasts all day with this.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is Amazing! I’ve never had an eye primer that held on my eye shadow all day. It keeps it bold from the time I put it on, to the time I take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Jennings

customer_reviews.title: BEST INEXPENSIVE EYE PRIMER
customer_reviews.text: Really good inexpensive eyeshadow primer! It makes your eyeshadow lasts all day to the point where it’s hard to remove it all. But it’s still a great primer, has a weird texture but I got through it
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Agu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This prevents my eyeshadow from creating little crease lines on my eyelid and maintains a smooth finish. Won’t ever go without it again. I can have nice eye makeup all day with the help of this primer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great base
customer_reviews.text: Great base especially for the price. Keeps eye shadow on all day and I have a problem with melting towards the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Works amazing, and doesn’t have an awful make-up smell.
customer_reviews.author: L E Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I mean it gets the job done, so not complaining there. I probably won't buy again however.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, eye makeup looks like I just put it on at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: angathaki

customer_reviews.title: If u have oily skin u will love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff my eyeshadow still looks the same when I wake up after a rough night
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Not great for blending
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this primer is great. My skin type is combination, more on the oily side. This primer works in the sense that it keeps my eyeshadow from smudging. However, it is difficult to blend the shadow (powder) when using it. Hence the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: rec

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best primer! I have tried so many different ones and this keeps my eyeshadow in place for the entire work day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: this is a simple yes , if you are in need of a eye shadow primer and don't want to spend a ton of Money, girl you better grab this one up! Works fab!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer pugh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing eyeshadow primer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeshadow primer!!! My eyelids get oily and my eyeshadow used to crease within hours. This primer makes my eyeshadow LAST ALL DAY!! A little bit goes a long way, so I think this will last me a long time. Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: JImmy

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: I've only used eye primer twice in my life. So not sure what to compare it to. This particular one works really well and it keeps my eyeshadow in place 90%. And the price is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Really works and travels great too!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much I bought a second for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Ooshop

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: The BEST eyeshadow primer I’ve ever used. Prevents my eyeshadow from creasing for a solid 12 hours. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: I can't find this is stores anymore!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't find this in stores anymore!! So happy!! I should've purchased several times
customer_reviews.author: Ainjel

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: It works great and really keeps my eye shadow in place all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best eye primer out there for an awesome price! Don’t spend more when this is the best and keeps your eyeshadow vibrant for 12 hours plus!
customer_reviews.author: trudy

customer_reviews.title: Will make things extremely long lasting
customer_reviews.text: A great primer blends and makes anything last for hours and hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE .FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE .FALSE ADVERTISING In bold letters this item says 1.6 oz Actual product is .34 oz Amazon was no help in correcting this. Not worth the time to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get it out of the tube!
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the product to come out. Snipped and snipped at the tube. No directions. Threw away.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this product. It leaves behind a white residue and my eyeshadow seemed kind of clumpy in certain spots whenever I use this primer.
customer_reviews.author: PremiumFruitDancer

customer_reviews.title: this is not a good product
customer_reviews.text: the product turned crusty and my eye shadow came right off after an hour
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kovalec

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help keep my eyebrow powder in place. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: dries pretty quick but overall, its a great eye primer
customer_reviews.author: noel martinez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eye lid primer! Cheap and keeps my shadow from creasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Bee

customer_reviews.title: Best Primer
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eye primer that helps my oily eye lids. 2 coats of it! My eyeshadow doesn't crease all day!
customer_reviews.author: nicole rockford

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's a dupe for urban decay eyeshadow ...
customer_reviews.text: Dude! This makes your eyeshadow stay on for dayyyyyyys!! I love it! It's a dupe for urban decay eyeshadow primer!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A.

customer_reviews.title: Product size not correct
customer_reviews.text: Item received was only .34 fl. Oz. Not the 1.6 fl. Oz. As indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Best primer I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: My eyeshadow NEVER stayed in place until used this primer. My eyelids are super greasy but they are no match for this stuff. Plus, you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works just like the Urban Decay primer potion, in my opinion. It's a thin formula that isn't going to cover up discoloration on your lids, but it does keep my eyeshadow from creasing all day.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Super effective, it really helps to extend the eyeshadow during the day!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Quesada Ureña

customer_reviews.title: Great product but ugly plain tube.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great product but I just don’t like the packaging. I don’t know what it is but the tube for the primer is so plain and makes it look like a cheap not gonna work product. But it works great and is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Lisa Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Lorac
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the Lorac eye shadow primer which quickly became way too expensive and I tried this eye shadow primer and I couldn't even tell the difference between the products! This is super cheap and keeps my eyeshadow from creasing!
customer_reviews.author: ivy

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great value! It only takes a tiny amount applied to your eyelids and your eye shadow doesn't budge until you're ready to take it off. My eye shadow looks as fresh at the end of my day as it did when I put it on that morning. I will continue to use this product as long as they keep making it! It's very light-weight and doesn't irritate my eyes at all, which is a huge plus for me as I have sensitive eyes. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tara N.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to the clear primer. This stuff is flesh colored. Which would be fine except it goes on and after it dries it feels like you put thin cement on your face. I’m going to use it since I bought but I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: The Rambling Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good primer
customer_reviews.text: I like this primer. It's a light cream with a slight pigment to it that goes on matte. So far, I haven't experienced any eye irritation while using this and my eyeshadow makeup does appear more vivid whenever I use this product. I don't know how great a job it does holding my eye makeup in place though. I still see creasing from time to time and fade using really powdery eyeshadow, but that probably means I should be applying them wet or start using better pigments...not really the primer's fault. In any case, I've been using this off and on over 2 weeks and I'm satisfied with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sea1towne

customer_reviews.title: The best eye shadow primer out there period!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shadow primer bar none. Its better than Bennifit brand, Loreal, Clinique any other brand I know because I’ve tried them all. It works period better than anything out there and it’s very inexpensive! I won’t be without it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried THE most expensive brands of eye shadow primer through the years with little success, but this one is absolutely the best! My eye shadow does not crease, my eye liner does not melt, even after 12 hours. I don’t understand why this one works so well on my oily deep set lids, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Get this one - don't spend money on more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years after using expensive department store primer. I only had found the bare minerals to work for me at$16 a tube. This one works just as well!! I have very oily eyelids. So oily that my fake lashes will un-stick without using primer and with eyeshadow my creases get so gross.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what’s changed. I had this before the nyx eyeshadow base I’m on now and kept wanting this one back. The last time I had it I was in love. This time around I can’t even see my eyeshadow. I wonder if the formula has changed. I doubt this was a fake. It does leave a sort of film so you do have to be very careful applying. Does dry out the eyelid which I love for my greasy ones. I just wish I could have the old kind back. It was always sold out on Ulta.com and I can never find it in stores so I know it’s a hot item. It’s too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this stuff! I put my eyeshadow on early in the morning, and by 9:00 it is STILL on just like it was at 9:00 am. It is crazy. It is almost hard to get off! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Dr Jane

product_meta.title: Wet & Wild Photofocus Eyeshadow Primer, 1.6 Ounce
product_meta.description: Long lasting. Cruelty free. This perfect primer preps and brightens eyelids to lockdown eyeshadow color. Its smooth, effortless application dries to a clear finish and keeps eyeshadow in place.
feature_bullets: Its smooth, effortless application dries to a clear finish and keeps eyeshadow in place
brightens eyelids to lockdown eyeshadow color
